name: Beyond Good & Evil

files.goginstaller: N/A:Select the Windows setup file downloaded from GOG

content:
files:
- goginstaller: N/A:Select the Windows setup file downloaded from GOG
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Beyond Good and Evil/BGE.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /LANG=en /SP- /NOCANCEL /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES
    executable: goginstaller
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
